name: Quenton
description: print("a vaporous form hovering before you.")

49: print("A shiver runs up your spine as you feel a chilling draft...\n")
print("The form is that of a man.")

print("

His mouth moves, yet no words can be heard...
")
print("You speak the word and the spectre responds by pointing a boney hand to his @eye.\n")
print("A wind from behind blows your hair, covering your eyes.\n")
print("A whirlpool of leaves, twigs and stones whips up around you.")

print("

Your clothing is yanked by the strong wind forcing you to grip it tightly in your hands.
")
print("A cool breeze blows through your hair.")

print("

You suddenly smell the scent of a storm approaching.
")
print("The ghostly image shimmers for a moment and then he points a boney finger to his neck.\n")
print("The spectre's arm thrusts out, pointing to the @sea.\n")
print("The spectre's arm thrusts again, this time.")

print("

This time you see it points towards the pier.
")
print("A strong breeze suddenly assaults you with twigs and leaves.\n")
print("You hear no answer save the rustle of the leaves on the ground around you.\n")
